name: Roll the Pattern
description:
Roll the dice by clicking and swiping in any direction. Form the patterns of dice dots with the dice to make them disappear. Your goal is to eliminate all the dice!! In case you need to look up patterns here there are:
You can enter into the free-look mode by holding right mouse button and dragging the mouse. PROGRAMING:
